name: PRINTER SET
description: This command will allow you to change the default printer sizes.
syntax: PSET WDT width TLNES total_lines PLNES printable_lines PWHR print_where

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The maximum number of printable columns. The default is 80.

parameters.name: total_lines
parameters.description: The maximum number of lines to a page. The default is 66.

parameters.name: printable_lines
parameters.description: The maximum number of printable lines on a page. The default is 60.

parameters.name: print_where
parameters.description: You can redirect the output to any of the standard devices with this option without using the MOUNT or PON (print to) command. This option will
